page.title: 01Whitfield Village
page.content: The village of Whitfield is situated approximately 4km from the port of Dover, 21km from Canterbury, 28km from Thanet, 1.5hours driving time from London and 2 hours from Calais. The population in 1801 was 164 and rose to 4923 by 1981 but we are sure that the figures have grown since then as many more houses have been built. In character, Whitfield consists of a series of housing estates that have been built outwards from both sides of the main road (A256) extending into agricultural land. The village has many amenities, the most important being the village hall, post office, paper shop, old people's homes, guide hut and the primary school. We also have a police and fire station. The farms have mostly arable land.
